name: Immortal's game
description:
Welcome to Immortal's game !

This wonderful television show will present you a poor candidate that will die for you, everytime in an original way !
With every death, they will gain more money to gain more items and to create more wonderful deaths ! But don't worry, if the contestant is good, they will find the exit ! Eventually...

Good luck to them !

Controls 
------------

UP/SPACE : Jump
LEFT/RIGHT : Move
ENTER : Talk/Interact
F : Use the freeze gun
B : Place a bomb
